scripts.bump-dependencies: tsx scripts/bump-dependencies.ts @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin eslint-config-yuanqing eslint-plugin-import eslint-plugin-prettier eslint-plugin-react eslint-plugin-react-hooks eslint-plugin-simple-import-sort eslint-plugin-sort-keys-fix stylelint-config-yuanqing
scripts.fix: turbo run fix && concurrently npm:fix:js npm:fix:json
scripts.lint: turbo run lint && npm run lint:js
scripts.postinstall: simple-git-hooks && tsx scripts/patch-figma-plugin-typings.ts && npm run build
scripts.prepackages-publish: turbo run fix lint test build
scripts.reset: npm run clean && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json './packages/*/node_modules' && npm install
scripts.website-build: npm run website-build:website && npm run website-build:storybook && npm run website-build:figma-plugin-json
scripts.website-build:website: cd packages/website && npm run website-build && cpy './build/**/*' ../../build
scripts.website-build:storybook: cd packages/ui && npm run storybook-build && cpy './build/**/*' ../../build/create-figma-plugin/storybook

simple-git-hooks.pre-push: npx turbo run fix lint test build
